name: RC Drone Challenge
description:
Play the ultimate 3D simulation of flying an RC drone though obstacles!

This drone flying game feels like like flying a rear drone in a rich detailed 3D world!

Select from several styles of drones to play many level challenges. Fly the drone though the rings within the time limit given to complete the level and move onto the next level.

Currently the version of the game features 4 types of drones and 20 levels.
